thread.title: Head of Hollywood academy: Diversity debate at top of agenda
thread.title_full: Head of Hollywood academy: Diversity debate at top of agenda

title: Head of Hollywood academy: Diversity debate at top of agenda
text: > Entertainment Head of Hollywood academy: Diversity debate at top of agenda FILE - This is a Monday, Sept. 29, 2014 file photo of Academy President Cheryl Boone Isaacs as she speaks during the press view at the "Hollywood Costume" exhibit in Los Angeles. Cheryl Boone Isaacs the president of Hollywood's movie academy says criticism about the lack of diversity among Oscar nominees has helped spark a vital global discussion about how to make the entertainment industry more inclusive. (AP Photo/Nick Ut, File)
